name: The Rabbit
description: LAP-1 unit, H4R3 division. The blades were made for expositions and demos. Intent were to show off the unit power and stability. On the field units are rarely seen with blades, and mostly replaced by ammo/weapon containers for scouts and infantry. Rumors has it that one neuro-pilot can actually use the blades and they're much, much deadlier than expected...we learned that the hard way...
